menuItems.label: About me
menuItems.content: My name is Megin van Herk, I have done both semesters in media design and AI. therefore I have a unique combination to be able to do practical and visual effects. For my portfolio I would love to incorporate such things.For the next couple of weeks I am planning to create a portfolio website that is anything from boring, it will include all the learning outcomes and potential project that I am going to do.
